title: fat_proc_decmap
description: This program makes a directionally encoded color (DEC) map for DTI results.

outfile_dec_rgb.title: Output DEC RGB
outfile_dec_rgb.description: Single file of type 'rgb' for RGB coloration display.

outfile_dec_unwt_thr.title: Output DEC Unweighted Thresholded
outfile_dec_unwt_thr.description: Single file of type 'rgb' without FA weighting but using FA to threshold where DEC values are calculated.

outfile_dec_sca.title: Output DEC Scaled
outfile_dec_sca.description: DEC file additionally scaled by a value (such as 0.7).

qc_dec_images.title: QC DEC Images
qc_dec_images.description: Set of cor, axi, and sag images (each a 5x3 montage) of the DEC data.

qc_dec_unwt_thrx_images.title: QC DEC Unweighted Thresholded Images
qc_dec_unwt_thrx_images.description: Set of cor, axi, and sag images (each a 5x3 montage) of the DEC unweighted thresholded data.

qc_dec_sca_images.title: QC DEC Scaled Images
qc_dec_sca_images.description: Set of cor, axi, and sag images (each a 5x3 montage) of the DEC scaled data.
